Name: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' occurring after 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' occurs

Name: Percentage of process variants where 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' appears at least once
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' is followed by 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' that are followed by 'SW-Reviewer No Response'
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Frequency of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' in variants that eventually lead to 'SW-EIC Accept'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' occurrences relative to the total number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' executions
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' events that occur more than 3 days after the initial reviewer invitation ('SW-AE Assign Reviewers')
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Frequency of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' in comparison to 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' that directly precede a change in editor assignment (e.g., 'Assign a Different Editor' or 'Unassign Editor')
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Number of process instances where 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' appears without a subsequent 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' within 7 days
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not occur

Name: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' occurring in the context of overdue reviewer selection (e.g., after 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late' or 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late')
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late'

Name: Frequency of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' in variants that include repeated reviewer declines ('SW-Reviewer Declined')
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' occurs

Name: Percentage of total reminder activities (i.e., 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2') accounted for by 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' that result in a final decision of 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit' or 'SW-EIC Major Revision'
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all cases
